import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import useSinglePost from "../custom-hooks/useSinglePost"; import "../css/SinglePost.css" function SinglePost() { const [post, isSingleLoading] = useSinglePost(); console.log(post) const {title, body, slug, dateTime, featureImage} = post return( <>
Back to All Blog Posts

{title}

{dateTime}
{body}
) } export default SinglePost
